title: Trump's feud with Walz reaches new heights after Minnesota ICE shooting
shortDescription: The Trump administration is fighting with Minnesota officials over Renee Good's killing after months of attacks from the president.

title: Mamdani, Trump and the pull to the edges amid midterms' discontent
shortDescription: Take over Greenland, anyone? Open government-run grocery stores? The politics of 2026 will not be for the faint of heart.

title: Nobel Institute says Machado cannot transfer Peace Prize to Trump
shortDescription: The Norwegian Nobel Institute said in a statement that Nobel Prizes cannot be 'revoked, shared, nor transferred to others' once awarded.

title: Donald Trump has quick dentist appointment in Florida
shortDescription: The White House motorcade was away from Mar-a-Lago for about two hours.

title: Trump confronts stark GOP divisions: 5 takeaways as 2026 gets rolling
shortDescription: The first week of January was a busy one in Congress, where the GOP confronted a newly slim margin and divisions over health care and foreign policy.

title: Who's next? Trump hints at US military action beyond Venezuela
shortDescription: After arresting Venezuela's president, Trump and top U.S. officials warned other countries could be the targets of American intervention next.

title: DOJ had a unit for defusing tense police protests. Trump killed it.
shortDescription: Since 1964, the Justice Department deployed specialized “peacemaker” experts to de-escalate violent confrontations. Trump shuttered the team in October.

title: Trump assails 'windmills' and wind energy as junk: 'They're losers'
shortDescription: While meeting with oil industry executives about Venezuela, Trump reaffirms dislike for wind energy, saying "I'm not much of a windmill person."

title: Big Oil says big changes needed for Trump's Venezuela plan to work
shortDescription: ExxonMobil's CEO said legal and commercial hurdles make Venezuela's oil "uninvestsable" unless the Trump administration pushes major changes.

title: President debuts 'Happy Trump' lapel pin
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he’s never happy, never satisfied, but he debuted a “Happy Trump” pin to wear on his lapel during a White House meeting.

title: Trump admin can't freeze $10B in child care funds to Dem states, judge rules
shortDescription: A judge temporarily blocked efforts by HHS to recover billions in funds for child care and family assistance, mostly for lower-income Americans.

title: Will Venezuelan opposition leader give Trump her Nobel Prize? Maybe.
shortDescription: President Trump said he will discuss prospect of Venezuela's opposition leader, María Corina Machado, giving him her Nobel Peace Prize when they meet.

title: 'Happy Trump' pin makes debut at White House discussion of Venezuela
shortDescription: Trump unveiled a 'Happy Trump' lapel pin at at White House discussion of rebuilding Venezuela and possibly taking control of Greenland.

title: Trump takes cautious approach amid mass Iran protests
shortDescription: President Trump has warned Iranian leaders that there will be "hell to pay" if they crack down on the protest movement.

title: Trump says US will take Greenland, potentially 'the hard way'
shortDescription: "If we don't do it the easy way, we're going to do it the hard way," Trump said about taking over Greenland, a territory of Denmark.

title: Trump says US will 'do something' on Greenland
shortDescription: President Trump said in a meeting with oil executives at the White House that the U.S. is "going to do something" on Greenland.
